traits.Blood Frenzy: The high priestess has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Limited Amphibiousness: The high priestess can breathe air and water, but she needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.
traits.Shark Telepathy: The high priestess can magically command any shark within 120 feet of her, using a limited telepathy.

actions.Multiattack: The high priestess makes two attacks with her toothsome staff, or one attack with her bite and one with her claws.
actions.Toothsome Staff: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
